thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ralf Büllesbach
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Ralf Büllesbach

author: Ralf Büllesbach
title: Ralf Büllesbach
text:
When I ordered items on banggood these arrived within an acceptable time frame normally.
My lastest experience was an item being out of stock. I was offered to receive the item in a different colour but denied and waited. Got information that item was restocked and sent to me. However, that particular item did not arrive. Contacted Banggood service and claimed the missing item.
Was told to wait for another 5 days for item to be received. But item did not come. Informed Banggood and they resent the item by registered mail which I received yesterday.
As a result I can recommend Banggood and its service strongly. If things go wrong they will try to fix it. Thanks Banggood!
